name: Floppy Football
description:
Floppy Football is made to be a cliché for the Game-Off 2022 game jam. 

Not much more cliché than someone submitting a flappy bird inspired game to a game jam!  But there is a bit of a twist to the game.  If you land in a pipe, you get a bonus wheel spin!

There is also some other cliché elements relating to the gaming industry as a whole, including a day 1 update! 

If you don't want to sit through the entirely fake Day 1 update, just hit the Escape key!

As part of the Game Off 2022 requires the use of Github, I have put all of the Unity source files available for anyone to view and use!
